Angular Validation. Watch. Blur. Submit. Submit-only. Additions.

Getting Started 
<form name="Form">
  <div>
      <label>Required</label>
      <input type="text" name="required" ng-model="form.required" validator="required">
  </div>
  <div>
      <label>Url</label>
      <input type="text" name="url" ng-model="form.url" validator="required, url">
  </div>
  <button validation-submit="Form" ng-click="next()">Submit</button>
  <button validation-reset="Form">Reset</button>
</form>
Form ($watch) 
<!-- default valid-method is watch -->
<input type="text" name="emailBlur" ng-model="form.email" validator="email"/>
Form ($blur) 
<input type="text" name="emailBlur" ng-model="form.email" validator="email" valid-method="blur"/>
Form ($submit with callback)
Form (Additions validation)
With Function
type: Huei Tan no-validation-message
Change Error Msg Type Again #
Form ($submit-only)
Form (ng-repeat)
In name attribute we have to use {{$index}} eg. emailRequiredOnly{{$index}}
